data.what_is:
AI Social Media Manager: Monitor social posts to find leads. Devi also create automated visual content and posts on Facebook groups, Twitter, LinkedIn and Reddit. 7000+ businesses use Devi every day to automate boring tasks. 
Devi automatically monitors your Facebook groups, LinkedIn, and other social media posts to find high-intent leads, then use 1-click messages to send your offer. Saves about 2 hours a day and close more deals.
data.product_description:
AI Social Media Manager: Monitor social posts to find leads. Devi also create automated visual content and posts on Facebook groups, Twitter, LinkedIn and Reddit. 7000+ businesses use Devi every day to automate boring tasks. 
Devi automatically monitors your Facebook groups, LinkedIn, and other social media posts to find high-intent leads, then use 1-click messages to send your offer. Saves about 2 hours a day and close more deals.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best advertising tool for your business promotion
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Devi?
I like the most about Devi is the way it is having all the strategis for the business promotion, none of the other software I came across is having those features.

What do you dislike about Devi?
Everything seems to be so perfect but, still there is a scope in improving the GUI so that even non professional can use it with ease.

What problems is Devi solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am using this tool for promoting my business. Me and my tem is using it very wisely to get more outreach and we are getting it easily.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Devi?
The very concept of automating the marketing scope is worth a shot

What do you dislike about Devi?
Lack of customer outreach from the automated workflows

What problems is Devi solving and how is that benefiting you?
It initiated a draft of how the marketing tactics can be surfaced
